titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey the Mancos Project features to the Mancos Water Conservancy District in the State of Colorado.
Mancos Water Conservancy District Conveyance Act
Mancos Water Conservancy District Conveyance Act
Mancos Water Conservancy District Conveyance Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water, Power and Oceans.

bill.summary:
Mancos Water Conservancy District Conveyance Act
This bill provides for the conveyance of the Mancos Project features (e.g., canals, facilities, and water rights) from the Bureau of Reclamation to the Mancos Water Conservancy District in Colorado.
